SpellDef.Description:
Keeps everyone happy! (-2% to faction-wide Unrest).
See Tooltip.

DOMAIN ::: Strategic ::: Self
EFFECT ::: - 2% Faction-wide Unrest ::: - 333 Crystals
FIGHTABLE ::: Not defendable ::: Not resistible
INTERVAL ::: Instant
OTHER ::: Caster must be Sov
SOURCE ::: All
